contentList.content: Might Crash Your Game
Toggle the VFX for the Crown Of Karsus
Toggle the VFX for the Infernal Mask
Toggle the VFX for the Infernal Bracers
Toggle the VFX for the Myconic Shield
Chest Of Many Things
Contains the items from Custom Item Pack.
Crown Of Karsus
Though Karsus could only have worn the crown for mere moments, he managed to destroy an empire, killing thousands in the process.
Infernal Mask
But Gith had nurtured a son. Orpheus, Prince of the Comet, the True Heir! He rallied Gith's Honour Guard and declared the throne for himself.
Myconic Sword
By the Gods, I hear it AND I see it AND I know it AND I feel it. But I can't write it. Or can I?
Myconic Shield
The chaotic fugue of Timmask-induced confusion is in many ways the exact opposite of Myconid meditation, which is calm, spiritual, and does not involve even a little bit of puzzled drooling.
Gilded Bulwark
Believe it or not, I'm not a Steel Watcher.
Sightless Eye
Try not to catch its eye. Unless you fancy a permanent position in the plaza promenade.
Astral Buckler
Give me my freedom from this form, release my soul to the Astral Seas while I still have one to call my own.
Bhaal's Visage
If Bhaal demands blood, thoust shall spill it for him.
Infernal Bracers
Bound by infernal chains, Orpheus could never leave. Bound by duty, his guard never would.
Myconic Choir: Melody
The sword hums in anticipation, ready to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_SUM_SingingSword_Sing">Sing</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_SUM_SingingSword_Shriek">Shriek</LSTag>.
Myconic Choir: Sing
Myconic Choir: Shreik
Myconic Choir: Singing
Myconic Choir: Shreiking
Myconic Choir: Song
Petrification
Direct the Sightless Eye's gaze upon a target, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PETRIFIED">Petrifying</LSTag> them until they next take damage.
Gaze Of Death

Focus Bhaal's gaze upon a target, if the target has less than 33% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Maximum HP</LSTag>, it is disintegrated, otherwise, it takes 25% of its <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Maximum HP</LSTag> as Force Damage.
Gilded Bulwark
Imbue your body with the malleability of gold, granting you +2 <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, and [1] with your Weapon Attacks.
Infernal Gaze
Sear and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag> a target with nothing but your glower.
Astral Projection

Shift into the Astral Plane to become Invulnerable and Invisible.

Astral Projection ends early if the entity attacks, casts another spell or takes another action.

Affected entity has shifted into the Astral Plane, leaving behind a projection. They are Invulnerable, have Advantage on Attack Rolls and impose Disadvantage on enemy Attack Rolls.

Astral Projection ends early if the entity attacks, casts another spell or takes another action.
Mental Domination
Dominate the mind of any living or undead creature for 10 Turns. Allies cannot be dominated.
Myconic Symbiosis

Grants immunity to Mind-Altering affects such as <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Madness</LSTag>.

This creature is under the influence of Myconic Symbiosis. They are Immune to Mind-Altering affects such as <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Madness</LSTag>.
Gilded
This entity is under the effect <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GILDED">Gilded Bulwark</LSTag> granting it +2 <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, and [1] with Weapon Attacks.
Dominated
Affected entity will follow and fight alongside the caster of this spell.
Hellfire Fists
Your fists pulse with Infernal Hellfire granting you [1] with Unarmed Attacks.
